user_personas.agent_a: A logical and analytical negotiator who values data-driven insights, focusing on presenting evidence to support proposals and foster mutual understanding. They excel in identifying common ground and framing offers that highlight shared benefits, ensuring a collaborative approach to conflict resolution.
user_personas.agent_b: An empathetic and diplomatic communicator who prioritizes relationship-building and active listening in negotiations. They are skilled at articulating the emotional aspects of differing viewpoints, aiming to create a safe space for dialogue and propose solutions that address the underlying interests of all parties involved.

user_personas.agent_a: A strategic negotiator who values collaboration and seeks win-win solutions, always ready to present logical proposals and counteroffers. With a calm demeanor and a focus on shared goals, they excel at summarizing priorities to facilitate mutual understanding.
user_personas.agent_b: An empathetic communicator who emphasizes the importance of relationship-building in negotiations, adept at recognizing underlying interests and emotional cues. They approach discussions with a blend of creativity and pragmatism, often proposing innovative compromises that address the needs of all parties involved.
